insert into course_res(res_video_name, res_file_name, course_id, res_blues, copyright) values (#{resVideoName}, #{resFileName}, #{courseId}, #{resBlues}, #{copyright})

SELECT student.student_id, student_name, student_gender, student_email FROM student, course_stu, course WHERE student.`student_id` = course_stu.`student_id` AND course.`course_id` = course_stu.`course_id` AND teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND course.course_id = #{courseId}

select student.student_id, student_name, student_gender, student_email, course_name FROM student, course_stu, course WHERE student.`student_id` = course_stu.`student_id` AND course.`course_id` = course_stu.`course_id` AND teacher_id = #{teacherId}
SELECT COUNT(cs.`course_id`) res FROM course_stu cs JOIN course c ON cs.`course_id` = c.`course_id` JOIN teacher t ON c.`teacher_id` = t.`teacher_id` WHERE t.`teacher_id` = #{teacherId};

SELECT c.course_name name, COUNT(cs.`course_id`) res FROM course c JOIN teacher t ON c.`teacher_id` = t.`teacher_id` LEFT JOIN course_stu cs ON cs.`course_id` = c.`course_id` WHERE t.`teacher_id` = #{teacherId} GROUP BY c.course_name
